## Loading and preprocessing the data


## Across the United States, which types of events (as indicated in the EVTYPE variable) 
## are most harmful with respect to population health?
```{r, echo = TRUE}
# Plot injuries + fatalities plotted against evtype
library(ggplot2)
plot <- ggplot(storm_data, aes(EVTYPE, (FATALITIES+INJURIES))) +
  geom_point() 
```

## Across the United States, which types of events have the greatest economic consequences?
```{r, echo = TRUE}
plot2 <- ggplot(storm_data, aes(EVTYPE, (CROPDMG+PROPDMG))) +
  geom_point() 
library(knitr)
```
